Name: The Haole
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale, stir and serve.
Review: Simple but very tasty and refreshing.
History: Thai Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail winning cocktail by Mitchell Kai Lum, Vertigo & Vertigo Too, Bangkok.
Nutrition: One serving of The Haole contains 189 calories
